name: Psycho Killer!
description:
Psycho Killer! is a casual game where you play as a serial killer with shit controls. Navigate your way around a house to find weapons and kill your victims before time runs out.

This game was made in Unity for a university project. Future plans are to redevelop the game from the ground up with more refined controls and mechanics, while also expanding the game's content.

The current build of the game stands as a concept/prototype.

Game and Music by Joshua Maikawa
